TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EffectFactory extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: The EffectFactory class defines the list of available Effects, and provides functionality to inspect and instantiate them.

Docs.param: The name of the effect to create.
Docs.summary: Instantiate a new effect with the given effect name.

Docs.exception: if the effect with the specified name is not supported or not known.

Docs.summary: Attempts to auto-fix the image based on histogram equalization.

Docs.summary: Replaces the background of the input frames with frames from a selected video.

Docs.summary: Overlays a bitmap (with premultiplied alpha channel) onto the input image.

Docs.summary: Applies a cross process effect on image, in which the red and green channels are enhanced while the blue channel is restricted.

Docs.summary: Applies black and white documentary style effect on image.

Docs.summary: Representation of photo using only two color tones.

Docs.summary: Applies back-light filling to the image.

Docs.summary: Flips image vertically and/or horizontally.
